name: Crystalize! 2: Quest for the Jewel Crown!
name_original: Crystalize! 2: Quest for the Jewel Crown!
description:
Crystalize! 2: Quest for the Jewel Crown! is a puzzle game developed by Webfoot Technologies. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by ValuSoft.
Crystalize! 2: Quest for the Jewel Crown! is available on PC.
